titleStmt.title: Demetrius his opposition to reformation. A sermon very necessarie for these times. As it was delivered (this last vvinter) before a great assemblie in the city of London. by John Tillinghast, sometimes rector of Tarring-Nevill, now rector of Streate in the county of Sussex.
titleStmt.author: Tillinghast, John, 1604-1655.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by I.P. and M.S. for Andrew Kembe at St. Margarets hill in Southwark,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
